alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 7:49PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Callahan, eastern Shackelford and southeastern Throckmorton Counties through 815 PM CST... At 749 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Admiral, or near Putnam, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baird, Cross Plains, Moran, Putnam, Atwell, Ibex, Rowden, Oplin, Lusk, Admiral, Us-283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line, Us- 180 Near The Shackelford-Stephens County Line, I- 20 Near The Callahan-Eastland County Line and Us- 283 Near The Coleman-Callahan County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 303 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for west central Texas.
